author: Paul Owers
title: Home prices off to good start in 2017
text:
Home prices off to good start in 2017 Home prices stay strong in 2017 
Re/Max agent Dean Ehrlich says the housing market remains robust. 
Re/Max agent Dean Ehrlich says the housing market remains robust. Caption Smart Homes On Display At 2017 CES Convention 
Smart Homes On Display At 2017 CES Convention 
Smart Homes On Display At 2017 CES Convention Caption Smart Homes On Display At 2017 CES Convention 
Smart Homes On Display At 2017 CES Convention 
Smart Homes On Display At 2017 CES Convention Caption $10M Bear's Club home perfect for avid art collectors 
$10M Bear's Club home perfect for avid art collectors 
$10M Bear's Club home perfect for avid art collectors Caption South Florida Real Estate Outlook 
A shortage of available properties should continue to drive prices higher for low-and middle-income homes across South Florida in 2017, housing analysts say. But thousands of high-end condos being built throughout the region could create a glut that hurts the luxury market.
